title: pscp doesn't work from Windows to Linux
body:
I want to copy directories from a Windows machine to Linux and vice versa using ssh. I used this command

pscp -r test user@remotehost:/home/.../test

to copy the content of the local directory test into the empty server directory test. In the local directory is for testing purposes a file called test.txt with 2-3 KB content. After executing the comment I could read:

test.txt                  | 2 kB |   2.8 kB/s | ETA: 00:00:00 | 100%

But when I check the server directory test it is still empty. Why?
